DOC.brief_summary: Phase II Trial of concurrent administration of intravesical BCG & Interferon in the treatment and prevention of recurrence of superficial transitional carcinoma of the urinary bladder.
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Trial of Concurrent Administration of Intravesical BCG & Interferon in the Treatment and Prevention of Recurrence of Superficial Transitional Carcinoma of the Urinary Bladder
DOC.criteria: Patients with superficial transitional carcinoma of the urinary bladder
